parts.text:
Review this implementation plan v3.5.

sanitizeForReview() uses regex to redact: connectionstring, password, lib paths.

CI/CD flow: security-gate (npm audit, snyk) -> test (lint, typecheck, unit, e2e) -> build (vite, lighthouse) -> deploy (preview/staging/production).

E2E scenarios: spec parsing (9 tables, 52 fields), full 11-step wizard, GUI tests (sidebar, forms, modals), user simulations (refresh, slow connection, API errors), accessibility (axe-core).

Complete plan: 3800 lines, feature-based architecture, 3 Zustand stores with persist, Build Stages A-F, Gemini AI with consent and fallback, OWASP security, per-step performance budgets, data lineage export, disaster recovery.

Provide JSON: {score: 0-100, summary: string, issues: [], strengths: [], approved: boolean}
